newsitem.title: USA: Autocam sees lower than expected Q3 EPS.
newsitem.headline: Autocam sees lower than expected Q3 EPS.

text.p: Autocam Corp said Friday it expects lower than anticipated results for the third quarter ended March 31 of $0.18 to $0.20 a share.
The company said the results were hurt by start-up costs associated with new fuel system programs.
Autocom, which makes precision-machined parts, did not specify the current estimate for the third quarter. According to First Call, the current mean estimate of analysts' estimates is $0.29 a share.

"Although it is common for margins to be lower on new program start-ups, third quarter margins were adversely effected by machine tools which were not only delivered late, but have not performed as expected," Autocam President John Kennedy said.
Kennedy added the company has seen margin improvement within these programs during the quarter and expects margins approaching those of the company's other programs within six months.
